attributes.action: Stop Grandfather's body from being exhumed in Leicestershire (This is after a muslim conflict).
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Grandfather's body from being exhumed in Leicestershire (This is after a muslim conflict).
As the cemetery in Burbage is multi-faith and NOT just for Muslims! The 89 year old man needs to R.I.P and not to be disturbed. Please sign if you follow. I want the person to be left alone and not to be disturbed also with it being a multi-faith cemetery then muslims must abide and follow rules. Reading the news via telegraph website.
